thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt are an adorable duo at a fashion show!
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt are an adorable duo at a fashion show!

author: Aishwarya V
title: Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt are an adorable duo at a fashion show!
text: January 7, 2017 Aishwarya V 6541 reads 6 comments + 29 Photos Designer Archana Kochhar launched a new bridal collection on Saturday to raise funds for underprivileged children. Superstar Shah Rukh Khan was the showstopper along with his Dear Zindagi co-star Alia Bhatt and former beauty queen and actor Esha Gupta. SRK sported a suave look wearing a black kurta and trousers. Alia walked the ramp with a perfect smile and was seen in a satin blue V-neck top with high waist wide leg dhoti pants. Esha looked gorgeous wearing a royal blue coloured gown. Moreover, the cute and adorable duo, SRK and Alia interacted with the media present there after the show ended. Their fun banter and camaraderie were a treat to watch. On the work front, SRK will be seen in Raees , Alia in Badrinath Ki Dulhania and Esha in Baadshaho .
